methods.javadoc:
returns the current program, given a tool, if a program is opened;
 otherwise returns null.
methods.name: getCurrentProgram
methods.comment:
returns the current program, given a tool, if a program is opened;
 otherwise returns null.

methods.name: shouldAskToAnalyze
methods.comment: Returns true if the program contains the analyzed flag.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program to check for the property

return.comment: true if the program contains the analyzed flag

methods.javadoc:
Removes the analyzed flag from the program properties.
 With this property removed, the user will be prompted to analyze the
 program the next time it is opened.
@param program the program containing the property to be removed
methods.name: removeAnalyzedFlag
methods.comment:
Removes the analyzed flag from the program properties.
 With this property removed, the user will be prompted to analyze the
 program the next time it is opened.

params.name: program
params.comment: the program containing the property to be removed

methods.name: setAnalyzedFlag
methods.comment: Sets the analyzed flag to the specified value.
